page.title: 13HOUSING IN PLATT.
page.content: When surveying housing in the area we found some areas of old housing but most of it was built at least since the second world war and many between 1965 and 1985. Most people live in houses that are either detached or semi-detached like the one described by Katie below. My house is semi-detached. It has 10 rooms,4 of them bedrooms. One bedroom is a spare room and we put things in there. The kitchen is quite small and wehave many labour saving devices such as a dishwasher, electric cooker and refrigerator. Our front room is big and we have a television, radio and stereo. Our dining room is where we eat and when it is sunny we sit in there. My bedroom is quite big but not as big as my brother's. We have a utility room where my mother does the washing and ironing.
